name: Sealer Assist Demo
detailed_description:
Sealer Assist is a Card based, Pixel Art role playing game set in a world
after a giant calamity has happened. take control of your named
protagonist and set out on a journey to save the world from the
impending Re-Death.

KEY RELEASE GAME FEATURES
  • Over 150 Attacks, builds and Cards
  • Interesting enemies
  • Pixel art
  • Skill & Turn based Combat
  • Developed by a Community of Dedicated fans
  • Enriched Story

KEY BETA FEATURES
  • Updates Weakly
  • Take part in the development on our discord!

short_description:
Take on the life of a moon elf who wants to protect, a moon elf who has lost something very important to him as you travel across
the earth of year 30XX after something terrible has happened to it!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP SP3, Vista (SP2), Windows 7 (SP1), Windows 8
  • Processor: Intel Pentium Dual-Core E2180 @ 2.0 GHz or AMD Athlon64 X2 3800+ @ 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB Direct X 9.0 compliant with shader model 3.0 or higher (NVIDIA GeForce 8800 GT / AMD Radeon HD 2900)
  • Storage: 3 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP SP3, Vista (SP2), Windows 7 (SP1), Windows 8
  • Processor: Intel Pentium Dual-Core E2180 @ 2.0 GHz or AMD Athlon64 X2 3800+ @ 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB Direct X 9.0 compliant with shader model 3.0 or higher (NVIDIA GeForce 8800 GT / AMD Radeon HD 2900)
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

legal_notice: Created by Dane Amato (Miro Tygira) and James Sabatier
